statements: SELECT * FROM students;
SELECT student_name, student_email FROM students;
SELECT student_name, student_age, student_field_of_study FROM students WHERE student_age > 20;
SELECT student_name, student_age FROM students WHERE student_field_of_study = 'Computer Science';
SELECT student_name, student_age, student_gender FROM students ORDER BY student_age DESC;
SELECT student_id, student_name, student_age FROM students WHERE student_gender='Male';
SELECT * FROM students WHERE student_age > 20 ORDER BY student_age DESC;
SELECT student_name, student_field_of_study FROM students WHERE student_age < 25 AND student_gender='Female';
SELECT DISTINCT student_field_of_study FROM students WHERE student_age BETWEEN 18 AND 22;
SELECT student_name, student_email FROM students WHERE student_field_of_study='Computer Science' AND student_age >= 20 ORDER BY student_name;
SELECT * FROM students WHERE student_id = 1;
SELECT student_name, student_email FROM students WHERE student_interests LIKE '%programming%';
SELECT student_id, student_name, student_email FROM students ORDER BY student_name DESC;
SELECT mentor_name, mentor_email FROM mentors WHERE mentor_expertise = 'Data Science';
SELECT * FROM students LEFT JOIN mentors ON students.student_id = mentors.mentor_id;
SELECT student_name, student_email FROM students WHERE student_id = 1;
SELECT student_name, student_email, student_interests FROM students WHERE student_email LIKE '%gmail.com';
SELECT * FROM students WHERE student_interests IS NOT NULL ORDER BY student_name ASC;
SELECT mentor_name, mentor_email, mentor_expertise FROM mentors WHERE mentor_expertise = 'Programming';
SELECT student_name, student_email, mentor_name, mentor_email FROM students JOIN mentors ON students.student_id = mentors.mentor_id;
SELECT * FROM students;
SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM students;
SELECT mentor_id, first_name, last_name, expertise FROM mentors;
SELECT student_id, first_name, last_name, email, phone_number FROM students WHERE education_level = 'Undergraduate';
SELECT mentor_id, first_name, last_name, expertise, availability FROM mentors WHERE education_level = 'Graduate';
SELECT * FROM students WHERE education_level = 'Undergraduate';
SELECT first_name, phone_number FROM mentors WHERE expertise = 'Data Science' ORDER BY first_name DESC;
SELECT student_id, mentor_id, match_date FROM match_history WHERE match_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30' ORDER BY match_date DESC;
SELECT CONCAT_WS(' ', first_name, last_name) AS full_name, email FROM students WHERE address LIKE '%Street%' LIMIT 5;
SELECT mentor_id, COUNT(match_id) AS total_matches FROM match_history GROUP BY mentor_id HAVING total_matches > 2 ORDER BY total_matches DESC;
SELECT * FROM Students ORDER BY student_name ASC;
SELECT student_name, student_email FROM Students WHERE student_age > 20;
SELECT course_name, course_description FROM Courses WHERE course_mentor_id = 1;
SELECT mentor_name, mentor_email, mentor_skills FROM Mentors;
SELECT student_name, student_age FROM Students WHERE student_age BETWEEN 18 AND 25;
SELECT * FROM Students WHERE student_age > 20;
SELECT student_name, student_email FROM Students WHERE student_age < 25 ORDER BY student_name ASC;
SELECT COUNT(*) AS mentor_count FROM Mentors;

SELECT Students.student_name, Mentors.mentor_name, Courses.course_name FROM Students JOIN Matches ON Students.student_id = Matches.student_id JOIN Mentors ON Mentors.mentor_id = Matches.mentor_id JOIN Courses ON Courses.course_mentor_id = Mentors.mentor_id;

SELECT student_name, mentor_name, match_date FROM Students JOIN Matches ON Students.student_id = Matches.student_id JOIN Mentors ON Mentors.mentor_id = Matches.mentor_id WHERE match_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM students;
SELECT student_id, student_name FROM students WHERE student_id = 1;
SELECT tutor_id, tutor_name, tutor_email FROM tutors WHERE tutor_name LIKE '%John%';
SELECT subject_name FROM subjects ORDER BY subject_name DESC;
SELECT student_name, subject_name FROM students JOIN student_interests ON students.student_id = student_interests.student_id JOIN subjects ON student_interests.subject_id = subjects.subject_id;
SELECT * FROM students;
SELECT student_name, student_email FROM students;
SELECT tutor_name, tutor_email FROM tutors WHERE tutor_id > 2 ORDER BY tutor_email DESC;
SELECT s.student_name, su.subject_name FROM students s JOIN student_interests si ON s.student_id = si.student_id JOIN subjects su ON si.subject_id = su.subject_id WHERE su.subject_id = 3;
SELECT ts.tutor_id, ts.subject_id, t.tutor_name, s.subject_name FROM tutor_subjects ts JOIN tutors t ON ts.tutor_id = t.tutor_id JOIN subjects s ON ts.subject_id = s.subject_id;
